net.unicon.cas.addons.authentication.handler

Class ShiroHashServicePasswordEncoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.unicon.cas.addons.authentication.handler.ShiroHashServicePasswordEncoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler.PasswordEncoder

    public final class ShiroHashServicePasswordEncoder
extends Object
implements org.jasig.cas.authentication.handler.PasswordEncoder
    Password encoder with salted and more cryptographically stronger hashing support which delegates all the work to Apache Shiro HashService API.

    This encoder optionally supports configuration options for digestAlgorithmName , salt, hashIterations

    If these options are not set at configuration time, the defaults as defined in DefaultHashService are used.

    Since:
    1.0.2
    Author:
    Dmitriy Kopylenko, Unicon, inc.
    See Also:
    http://shiro.apache.org/static/current/apidocs/org/apache/shiro/crypto/hash/DefaultHashService.html
